remarks: Apply a group homomorphism to a group sum.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2016.)  Obsolete version of ~ gsumzmhm as of 6-Jun-2019.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
gsumzmhmOLD.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsumzmhmOLD.z $e |- Z = ( Cntz ` G ) $.
gsumzmhmOLD.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Mnd ) $.
gsumzmhmOLD.h $e |- ( ph -> H e. Mnd ) $.
gsumzmhmOLD.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsumzmhmOLD.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. ( G MndHom H ) ) $.
gsumzmhmOLD.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
gsumzmhmOLD.c $e |- ( ph -> ran F C_ ( Z ` ran F ) ) $.
gsumzmhmOLD.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsumzmhmOLD.w $e |- ( ph -> ( `' F " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin ) $.
gsumzmhmOLD $p |- ( ph -> ( H gsum ( K o. F ) ) = ( K ` ( G gsum F ) ) ) $.
